profile:
At Reliance, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are synonymous for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

Reliance Home Comfort has been delivering high quality home comfort products and services for over 40 years. Specializing in furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters and plumbing, we provide our customers with peace of mind and are with you every step of the way. When you choose Reliance, you’re choosing one of the largest HVAC providers in Canada, with over 1.7 million customers and growing. You can expect your call to be answered 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. With one of the largest networks of licensed technicians in Canada, we respond to over 500,000 service calls each year. 
After all, we believe you are investing in much more than home comfort equipment, you’re investing in a relationship and your satisfaction is our top priority.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!

profile:
We believe that the water we use in our homes should be just that - water.  It doesn't need the extra stuff like Chlorine, Lead, Volatile Organic Compouns (VOCs) and countless other contaminants that so often end up in our water.  We make filtration solutions designed to deliver great-tasting water that doesn't contain all that other stuff.  We want to empower you with honest information and make the science of water filtration easy to understand so that you can make the best decision for you.  We also believe that by educating people about water filtration, we can do our part to help curb bottled water consumption, which has contributed millions of tons of plastic waste to our landfills. 

Since 2010, we have installed thousands of our innovative Whole Home and Under Counter filtration systems throughout Canada and the US.  We designed our patented EZChange systems to offer the best tasting water possible, while maintaining easy installation with a minimal equipment footprint.  Our flagship products are precision engineered and meticulously tested here in North America.

We are extremely proud of our products and we will do our best to make sure that our customers are happy.

profile:
COVID-19 payment plan option: 12 months zero-payment and zero-interest program (please call for details). Offer ends September 30th, 2020.
 
 
 
Filter The Entire Home
Our whole-home filter gets connected  to your main water line so every faucet in your home will have pure, clean and healthy water
 
Save Money!
No need to buy any more over the counter fridge filters or plastic water bottles.
 
99.9 Percent Clean
Our exclusive filters made of coconut shell carbon filter out 99.9 percent of harmful chemicals, pesticides, and chlorine to give you clear, healthy water.
 
Environmentally Friendly
By having a whole-home filtration system, you will reduce plastic waste from water bottles and do your part to save the environment.
 
Call us today for a free in-home visit for an estimate at 1-844-311-3644!
 

Note: We only service our own products and sell our own products. 

 
For more info, check us out on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Thewaterpros/
services:

profile:
Just Pure is an international provider of premium Bottle-Less Water Coolers and Drinking Water Purification Systems that are custom-manufactured to our specifications for commercial and residential use. We are a Canadian owned and operated company with over 15 years of experience in the water treatment industry.
Our bottleless water coolers are a modern and cost-effective alternative to old fashioned water coolers with bottles on top. We offer healthier and more hygienic water that is filtered fresh on demand. Just Pure Water’s line of products help businesses and consumers reduce the environmental impact created by the production, transportation, and disposal of plastic bottles.

profile: Since 2002 Waterland has been providing water softeners, water filters, bulk wholesale self-serve filtered water to thousands of satisfied customers throughout the western part of the GTA, through Mississauga, Oakville Burlington and Hamilton.  We have installed thousands of systems, from whole-home to reverse osmosis, alkaline, micro and ultra filtration.  We are the exclusive distributors or Propur filtrations systems, and Waterland has one of the only tankless reverse osmosis systems on the market.  As well we feature only recognized, respected brand names such as Ecowater, Pentair, Everpur, Watts, Berkey and Purotwist. These are local companies with solid reputations, reliable warrantees, and decades of proven quality.  We install and service all brands, and we are recognized for outstanding customization at very competitive prices  Our showroom features everything we carry and our website provides immediate convenient shopping.  We back and support everything we sell, and we test each component thoroughly.  We also have a large self serve water station featuring the best in reverse osmosis, alkaline and distilled water, sold in bulk wholesale lots with a wide variety of containers on sale.  For 17 years we have provided great value, and great service.

profile:
Call us at 905-629-0190 to find an authorized EcoWater dealer near you or log on to our website for more information.

Today, EcoWater stands alone as the leader and innovator of products for the treatment of water.

With an array of exclusive features, the EcoWater Systems' line of water treatment products is guaranteed to provide your family conditioned, clean water by treating and filtering the water that enters your home.

Our reverse osmosis (RO) water systems provide the best purified water for drinking and cooking. Even better, use of an RO system with reuseable water containers will help reduce the millions of plastic bottles clogging up our landfill sites.

Our water softners and filters extend the life span of household appliances and prevent unsightly staining. They reduce the use of soap and cleaning products, which will save you money and create less waste and pollution.

Hardness minerals cause scale buildup that can make water heaters less efficient and cost more to operate. Scale can also damage water-using appliances and clog plumbing.
name: Ecowater Canada Ltd
